title: Study tips (Captioned)
brief_description: Wayne’s exams are two week away and he is in a panic. With Uncle Jack’s help he develops a positive attitude towards study and more effective study techniques. With Lance Curtis and Geoff Kelso. This entertaining program provides simple tips on improving study skills, for lower and middle secondary school.
